data_table.description: Survival File and Follow-up for Atrial Fibrillation and Atrial Flutter Events, Original, Offspring, NOS, and Generation 3 through 2011. This dataset contains validated endpoints information and should be used in conjunction with the corresponding AF file - in this case dataset vr_afi4srv_2011_a_0845s.

variable.name: afx
variable.comment: This status refers to the initial case of atrial fibrillation/atrial flutter for each participant.

variable.name: afxdate
variable.description: Date of atrial fibrillation/atrial flutter status
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. This date corresponds to the date the participant had their initial AF or the date of censoring (last known date the participant did not have AF). Please refer to the protocol for explanation as to how the censoring date was calculated. Number of days since Exam 1.
